pages.text: 9|48|geudeul-eun geu ijeon-edo gyolan-eul eummohayeo geudaeleul goelobhilyeo hayeoss-euna jinliwa geudeul-i silh-eohaneun hana nim-ui malsseum-i seunglihayeossnola
9|49|geudeul gaunde jeoleul je-oesikyeo jusigo jeoleul siheomhaji maobsoseo lago malhaneun jaga iss-eoss-euna geudeul eun imi yuhogdoeeo jiog-i geudeul bulsinjadeul-eul ewossago iss-eossnola

9|50|gippeum-i geudaeege gisdeul ttae geudeul-eul seulpeuge hal geos-iyo geudaee ge bulhaeng-i issdamyeon geulihayeo uli neun imi juuileul hayeoss-eum-ila lago malhamyeo geudeul-eun gippeohamyeo dol-aseolila
9|51|illeogalodoe hananimkkeseo myeonglyeonghan geos oeeneun uliege amu geosdoiss-eul su eobsnani geubun-eun uliui bohojaisa midneun salamdeul-i uijihaneunbun-isila

9|52|illeogalodoe yeong-gwangseuleoun il dugaji gaunde hanaleul uliege gidaehaneunyo ulineun hananim seuseulottoneun uliga neohuiege beol-eul naeli gileul gidaligo issnani gidalila ulido neohuiwa hamkke gidaligo iss eulila
9|53|illeogalodoe maji moshayeo ji bulhanda hayeodo neohuilo buteoneun su lagdoeji anhnani neohuineun saaghan mu liinila

9|54|geudeul-i bachineun eoneu geosdo sulagdoeji aniham-eun geudeul-i hananimgwaseonjijaleul bulsinhaessgo yebaeleul haenghajianihago geeuleum-eul peoumyeo jung-yeohaneun geos-eul kkeolyeohayeossgi ttaemun-ila
